document.full_text: china's best known rights lawyer, missing for nearly a year, is being detained in violation of international law, a united nations human rights body said in a statement made public on monday, and it called for his immediate release.
document.title: u.n. rights body calls on china to release rights lawyer
lines_and_colors: china's best known rights lawyer, missing for nearly a year, is being detained in violation of international law, a united nations human rights body said in a statement made public on monday, and it called for his immediate release.
